definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
sporting event/item on program of sports competition
time trial (e.g. in cycle race)/timed race/competition against the clock
to start a match/to kick off

sentences.english: Horses should be walked for a while after a race.
sentences.chinese: 比赛后，应让马慢走一会儿。

sentences.english: Jane Zhang did a cover of this song during her performance at Super Girl.
sentences.chinese: 张靓颖在超级女声的比赛中表演过这首歌。

sentences.english: Sharapova lost to Sam Stosur in her opening match on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 周二莎拉波娃在她的首场比赛中输给了萨姆斯托瑟。

sentences.english: I hope to be available for the Coppa Italia match against Udinese. I remain confident.
sentences.chinese: 希望在意大利杯对阵乌迪内斯的比赛时我能复出吧。

sentences.english: Don't bet on winning the game.
sentences.chinese: 不要以为能侥幸赢得比赛。

sentences.english: This competition is open to two categories: Open Category and Secondary Category.
sentences.chinese: 是次比赛分公开及中学组两组。

sentences.english: Will they beat the 83 century record for the championships?Yes or no?
sentences.chinese: 他们这次比赛能打破原来83次单球破百的记录吗？

sentences.english: It rained， therefore the football match was put off.
sentences.chinese: 天下雨，所以足球比赛延期了。

sentences.english: Well, we ended up walloping them. We took every weight class.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们最终大败他们，赢得了所有重量级的比赛。

sentences.english: Professional athletes were fully embraced, finally ending the tradition of amateurism at the games.
sentences.chinese: 专业运动员被完全接受，终于在比赛结束的业余传统。

sentences.english: Pull off a successful 4-point play with any player, in a non-simulated game.
sentences.chinese: 非模拟模式比赛，使用任意球员完成四分打。

sentences.english: I have also written a good essay, essay competitions among the best.
sentences.chinese: 我作文也写的很好，征文比赛名列前茅。

sentences.english: Punting is an important part of the game.
sentences.chinese: 踢凌空球是那项比赛的一个重要部分。

sentences.english: But Ryan Reser of the U.S. judo team has never been to the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 但是这位美国柔道选手以前从来没有参加过奥运比赛。

sentences.english: Let`s go to watch the gymnastics competition.
The race started at one side of a river and all the animals had to swim to the other side.
sentences.chinese: 比赛始于河的一畔，而所有的动物都必须游到对岸。

definition: poised for battle/to square up for a fight
on stage/to go on stage/to take the field
half of a game or contest/half-court
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
competition schedule/the course of a race
